name: Timmy JOHNSON, Appellant v. Thomas LAVAN, Superintendent of State Correctional Institution Dallas; Jeffrey Beard, Commissioner, Department of Corrections; William F. Ward, Chairman, Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole, et. al., Appellees

parties: Timmy JOHNSON, Appellant v. Thomas LAVAN, Superintendent of State Correctional Institution Dallas; Jeffrey Beard, Commissioner, Department of Corrections; William F. Ward, Chairman, Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole, et. al., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 6th day of February, 2004, the order of the lower court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
843 A.2d 1222
Timmy JOHNSON, Appellant v. Thomas LAVAN, Superintendent of State Correctional Institution Dallas; Jeffrey Beard, Commissioner, Department of Corrections; William F. Ward, Chairman, Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole, et. al., Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 6, 2004.
